-- Using external data source read calendar file

USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(  
                BULK  'calendar.csv',
                DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                FORMAT = 'csv',
                PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
                FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
                ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
            )AS cal ;


-- Run stored procedure to column details
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT *
    FROM OPENROWSET(  
                BULK  ''calendar.csv'',
                DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
                FORMAT = ''csv'',
                PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
                HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
                FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
                ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
            )AS cal'

-- using WITH give proper column name and datatype

SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(  
                BULK  'calendar.csv',
                DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                FORMAT = 'csv',
                PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
                FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
                ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
            )
WITH (
    date_key INT,
    date DATE,
    year SMALLINT,
    month TINYINT,
    day TINYINT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    day_of_year SMALLINT,
    week_of_month TINYINT,
    week_of_year TINYINT,
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    year_month INT,
    year_week INT
)

AS cal ;
